Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
9,029 SF - OFFICE BUILDING

Sell a 9,029 SF office Building at 699 Bloomfield Avenue located in Bloomfield Center in Bloomfield, Connecticut. There is a full floor opportunity on the first floor for a user/buyer.

+ Currently occupied, seller can stay or vacate a full floor
+ Walking distance to restaurants, banks and shopping
+ Abundant parking
+ Offered well below replacement cost
+ New HVAC compressors
+ For Sale: $595,000

The building is ±2,548 SF on the 1st and 2nd floor and has a lower level of ±1,332 SF. It is located in a B-2 zone, which allows for multiple uses including retail, office, medical, and apartments. Built in 1984, the facade has been updated with Hardie Board siding, newer roof, windows and gutter guards installed, and parking area (to be crack sealed prior to sale). The main floor is configured as a salon, which can be easily updated or converted, two apartments on the 2nd floor (one is rented on a monthly basis and one is now vacant), and an antique shop on the lower level (divisible for two smaller tenants). The building is ideal for a user/investor looking to own and occupy space. There is the ability to rent out all or portion of the commercial space, as well as the apartments, to generate additional income. The building sits on 1.53 ares and is situated on the corner of Wolcott Road with great visibility, multiple entrances, plus the ability for building and monument signage. There is also an upper and lower level parking area. The property has been professionally managed and maintained since it was initially acquired. For Sale: $370,000

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The property is well located within one mile of Interstate 95, Route 1, the Bridgeport train station, Bridgeport ferry and Webster Bank Arena.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 387 Clinton Avenue is a ±6,000 SF former residential home on .20 acres that was repositioned as an administrative office by the Y in 1998. The building sits in the RC (residential, multifamily) zone.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 6,000 SF Former YMCA Office Available for Sale

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE has been exclusively retained for the sale of 140 Willow Street, Unit 3 in Winsted, CT. This is a great opportunity for a user or investor to own a portion of a well-maintained, quality office/medical building in the newly revitalized Downtown Winsted.

1,840 SF office condo with direct first floor entrance

Formerly occupied by a broadcast company with reception/waiting area, private offices, studio space, break room and bathroom

Walk to the local shops, restaurants, brewery and banks

Join an optometrist, dentist, law firm and land surveyor in this professional office setting

Easy and convenient parking next to the building.

For Sale: $125,000

GREAT FOR OFFICE OR SMALL RETAIL BUILDING


For sale 5 Sunny Ridge Road, a 1,168 SF stand-alone building, in Bethlehem, Connecticut. This property is located in the center of town near the historical district. It is perfect for an office or retail user or investor.

Total Square Feet: 1,168 SF
Year Built: 1959
Acres: 0.37
Zoning: R-1
Real Estate Taxes: $2,274.48
